column4: Just wondering how do you uninstall the latest updates they have messed my computer I can no longer select my knetwork wireless
Istarnes Just wondering how do you uninstall the latest updates they have messed my computer I can no longer select my knetwork wireless
I don
I don't know
and I don't think it's recommended either
what do you mean by "wrecked" ?
I can't see your messages very well.  Make sure that the letter at the start of my nick is a lowercase L
what model network card are you using?
its a broadcom heh
which version of ubuntu are you using?
fresh install of 9.10 cause when I upgraded it broke alot of stuff, since I dont know what ubuntu devs are doing, I mean i appreciate what they are doing but damn
I generally would not use a release that isn't an LTS
did you have to do anything special before to get your wireless to work?
all I did was do an update everything was working beautifully
it sucks cause everything was finally working and then i do an update and its wrecked I cannot select anything
in the wireless that is
the thing is that Im using the wireless right now I had to boot into safe mode
then it's something in the regular mode causing it
exactly
what happens when you boot back into the regular mode after using safe mode?
ok well i would probably  have to do that in the regular mode to find a problem message
I'm not sure how to fix the issue that you are having.  I can't figure out what to look for in the bug reports either
